documentation.text:
Accept message hash and returns hash message in EIP712 compatible form
 So that it can be used to recover signer from signature signed using EIP712 formatted data
 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-712
 "\\x19" makes the encoding deterministic
 "\\x01" is the version byte to make it compatible to EIP-191

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Signer and signature do not match"

arguments.value: Signer and signature do not match

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Signer and signature do not match"

documentation.text:
This is used instead of msg.sender as transactions won't be sent by the original token owner, 
 but by OpenSea.

As another option for supporting trading without requiring meta transactions, 
 override isApprovedForAll to whitelist OpenSea proxy accounts on Matic

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
literal_string "ERC721Metadata: URI query for nonexistent token"

arguments.value: ERC721Metadata: URI query for nonexistent token

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC721Metadata: URI query for nonexistent token"
